content: increase single_crochet in next three increase 10 four st decrease* repeat round 7 single_crochet in each st 10 around 20 round 8 single_crochet in next two increase round 18 *single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet in next four increase single_crochet in decrease* repeat around 15 last two st 12 fasten_off leave a long round 9 single_crochet in each st 12 yarn tail to sew to ghost round 10 *single_crochet in next three body increase* repeat around 15 round 11 *single_crochet increase single_crochet in next stuff with fiber fill using three* repeat around 18 yarn tail and yarn needle round 12 *increase single_crochet in next weave the tail through the five* repeat around 21 front loops on the round 13 *single_crochet in next three remaining stitches and increase single_crochet in next three* repeat pull it tight to close around 24 round 14 working in front place hat at a jaunty angle loop only *increase single_crochet in next on top of the ghost body five st* repeat around 28 between rounds 1 and 9 sew to ghost body using yarn tail black hat pictures 3 dnuor 11 dnuor tah dnef 7 dnuor 61 dnuor
